meanings.definition: Of or relating to a farewell address or speech given at a graduation ceremony.
meanings.sent1: The valedictories speech was heartfelt and emotional.
meanings.sent2: She delivered the valedictories address with confidence and grace.
meanings.sent3: The valedictories message brought tears to everyone's eyes.
meanings.sent4: Her valedictories words echoed in the halls long after the ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The valedictories speech left a lasting impact on the audience.

meanings.definition: The act of bidding farewell or saying goodbye.
meanings.sent1: Saying valedictories to friends at the airport is always hard.
meanings.sent2: The valedictories at the end of the party were filled with hugs and well-wishes.
meanings.sent3: His valedictories seemed never-ending as he kept finding more people to say goodbye to.
meanings.sent4: The valedictories exchanged between old friends were filled with nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The valedictories of the departing soldiers were met with solemn salutes.
